name: The Final Steward's Vow
fieldIntelligence: To activate the sacred and final transition of stewardship. This Meta-Glyph is the ritual process by which a master practitioner or leader consciously declares their own cycle of active leadership complete (inferred as Ω49), blesses and empowers their successor or the next generation (inferred as Ω56), and then gracefully recedes into a new, selfless role as a silent guardian of the space for what's to come (⨀ - The Mantling).
